Patients treat 4 monthly injection degarelix along two 8-week cycle chemotherapy . Each cycle chemotherapy consist 6 week chemotherapy 2 week rest . In absence toxicity disease progression , patient receive 2 cycle treatment prior radical prostatectomy . The primary endpoint complete near-complete pathologic response .
